name: Fruit Crush
description:
Fruit Crush is a match-three addictive game and a Great casual game.
How to play:

1 - Get the Target Score - Swipe Fruits and crush them to reach the required score and get the stars
2 - Timed Levels - Get the targets before the time runs out
3 - Collect Drinks - Crush the Candy and collect all the Drinks
4 - Dirty Sugar Crush - Destroy all the Dirty Sugar Candy blocks
5 - Sugar Bomb - destroy Sugar Bomb until they explode
6 - Jelly Cage - break Jelly Cages

Game features:
1 - 100+ well designed levels
2 - Sweet powerful combo boosters and delicious power ups
3 - Stunning graphics and unique gameplay
4 - Easy to play, challenging to master
5 - Play with your Friends
6 - Share your score with your Facebook friends
7 - Free to play
8 - one of the best fruit games
